_comment: China (PRC) compliance norms and standards database. Includes CCC, GB standards, SRRC, MIIT, NMPA and other Chinese regulatory requirements. Updated for 2025 compliance requirements.

norms.name: China Compulsory Certification (3C)
norms.applies_to: Products on CCC catalogue (22 categories including IT, AV, household appliances, cables, automotive)
norms.description: Mandatory safety certification for products on CCC catalogue. Testing, factory inspection, ongoing surveillance. CCC mark required on product and packaging. Cannot import or sell without CCC.

norms.name: CCC for Information Technology Equipment
norms.applies_to: Computers, monitors, printers, servers, network equipment
norms.description: CCC certification for IT equipment category. Testing to GB 4943.1 (safety) and GB 9254/17625.1 (EMC). Factory inspection required. Validity 5 years with annual surveillance.

norms.name: CCC for Audio/Video Equipment
norms.applies_to: TVs, audio equipment, set-top boxes, projectors
norms.description: CCC certification for AV equipment. Testing to GB 8898 (safety) and GB 13837 (EMC). Factory inspection. Different from IT equipment certification.

norms.name: CCC for Household Appliances
norms.applies_to: Household appliances (refrigerators, washing machines, air conditioners, etc.)
norms.description: CCC certification for household appliances. Testing to GB 4706 series (safety). Multiple subcategories with specific requirements.

norms.name: CCC for Cables and Wires
norms.description: CCC certification for cables. Testing to GB 5013, GB 5023 and other cable standards. Mark must be on cable itself at regular intervals.

norms.name: CCC for Power Supply Units
norms.applies_to: AC-DC and DC-DC power supplies, chargers, adapters
norms.description: CCC certification for power supply units. Testing to GB 4943.1 or GB 8898 depending on application. Factory inspection required.

norms.name: CCC for Lithium-Ion Batteries and Power Banks
norms.description: CCC certification for portable electronic products lithium-ion batteries and power banks. Added to CCC catalogue in 2023. Testing to GB 31241. Factory inspection.

norms.name: Safety of Information Technology Equipment
norms.applies_to: IT equipment, computers, servers, networking equipment
norms.description: Chinese safety standard for IT equipment. Based on IEC 62368-1 but with Chinese deviations. Required for CCC certification of IT products. Replaces GB 4943.1-2011.

norms.name: Safety Requirements for Audio, Video and Similar Electronic Apparatus
norms.description: Safety standard for AV equipment. Based on IEC 60065 but with Chinese requirements. Used for CCC certification of AV products.

norms.name: Household and Similar Electrical Appliances - Safety - General Requirements
norms.description: General safety requirements for household appliances. Based on IEC 60335-1. Part 1 of comprehensive series used for CCC certification.

norms.name: Household Appliances - Safety - Particular Requirements
norms.description: Part 2 series with specific safety requirements for different appliances. Multiple parts covering specific products.

norms.name: Safety Requirements for Portable Electronic Devices Lithium-Ion Cells and Batteries
norms.description: Safety requirements for lithium batteries. Based on IEC 62133 with additional Chinese requirements. Required for CCC certification of batteries. Updated 2022.

norms.name: Information Technology Equipment - Radio Disturbance Characteristics - Limits and Methods of Measurement
norms.description: EMC emission requirements for IT equipment. Class A (commercial) and Class B (residential) limits. Used for CCC EMC testing.

norms.name: Limits for Harmonic Current Emissions
norms.applies_to: Equipment with input current ≤16A per phase
norms.description: Harmonic current emission limits. Based on IEC 61000-3-2. Required for CCC EMC testing.

norms.name: EMC Requirements for Sound and Television Broadcast Receivers and Associated Equipment
norms.description: EMC requirements for AV equipment. Emission and immunity requirements. Used for CCC certification.

norms.name: State Radio Regulation of China - Radio Type Approval
norms.applies_to: All radio transmitting equipment including WiFi, Bluetooth, cellular
norms.description: Mandatory radio type approval. Testing of RF parameters, frequency, power, spurious emissions. SRRC certificate and label required. Cannot import or sell radio equipment without SRRC.

norms.name: Radio Equipment Model Approval Code
norms.description: CMIIT ID number issued after SRRC approval. Must be labeled on product. Format: CMIIT ID: 2024XXXXXXXX. Unique identifier for each radio model.

norms.name: Safety Requirements for Mobile Phones
norms.description: Safety requirements specific to mobile phones. Includes SAR limits (2.0 W/kg over 10g). Required for mobile phone certification.

norms.name: Specific Absorption Rate Requirements
norms.applies_to: Mobile phones and body-worn wireless devices
norms.description: SAR limit: 2.0 W/kg averaged over 10g of tissue. Testing required for mobile phones. Part of SRRC and CCC requirements for wireless devices.

norms.name: Telecommunications Equipment Network Access License
norms.applies_to: Equipment connecting to public telecommunications network
norms.description: Mandatory for telecom terminal equipment. Testing at MIIT-designated labs. Includes wired phones, modems, networking equipment connecting to carriers. NAL mark required.

norms.name: Management Methods for Restriction of Hazardous Substances in Electrical and Electronic Products
norms.description: China RoHS 2.0. Marking requirements for all EEE. Basic marking or qualified marking. Management catalogue for restricted substances. Limits for lead, mercury, cadmium, Cr6+, PBB, PBDE.

norms.name: Environmental Protection Use Period (EPUP) Marking
norms.description: Mandatory marking showing number of years product can be used without hazardous substances leaking. E-logo with number (10, 20, 25, etc.). Orange version if exceeds limits.

norms.name: Requirements for Concentration Limits for Certain Restricted Substances
norms.description: Concentration limits for hazardous substances similar to EU RoHS. Testing methodology for China RoHS compliance.

norms.name: China Energy Efficiency Label
norms.description: Mandatory energy efficiency label. 1-5 grade scale (Grade 1 most efficient). Required for appliances, electronics, lighting in catalogue. Registration before sale. Administered by NDRC/AQSIQ.

norms.name: Minimum Allowable Values of Energy Efficiency and Energy Efficiency Grades - Computers
norms.description: Energy efficiency requirements and grading for computers. Mandatory minimum efficiency. Energy label required.

norms.name: Minimum Allowable Values of Energy Efficiency and Energy Efficiency Grades - External Power Supplies
norms.description: Energy efficiency requirements for external power supplies. Minimum efficiency levels. Energy label required for products in scope.

norms.name: National Medical Products Administration - Medical Device Approval
norms.description: Medical device registration by NMPA (formerly CFDA). Classification I, II, III based on risk. Pre-market approval required. Clinical trials often needed. Quality system inspection.

norms.name: Medical Devices - Risk Management
norms.description: Chinese medical device risk management standard. Based on ISO 14971. Required for NMPA registration.

norms.name: Medical Devices - Quality Management System - Requirements
norms.description: Chinese medical device quality management system. Based on ISO 13485. Required for NMPA registration and manufacturing license.

norms.name: Medical Electrical Equipment - General Requirements for Safety
norms.description: General safety requirements for medical electrical equipment. Based on IEC 60601-1. Required for medical device registration.

norms.name: Cybersecurity Law of the People's Republic of China
norms.description: Comprehensive cybersecurity law. Data localization, security assessments, incident reporting. Affects connected devices, cloud services, data processing. Enforcement since 2017.

norms.name: Multi-Level Protection Scheme
norms.description: Cybersecurity classification and protection system. 5 levels based on impact if compromised. Level 2+ requires assessment and filing. Affects enterprise systems, cloud platforms.

norms.name: Personal Information Protection Law
norms.description: China's comprehensive data privacy law. Similar to GDPR. Consent requirements, data subject rights, cross-border transfer restrictions. Enforcement since November 2021. High penalties.

norms.name: Data Security Law of the People's Republic of China
norms.description: Framework for data security. Data classification, protection obligations, cross-border transfer reviews. Complements Cybersecurity Law and PIPL. Enforcement since 2021.

norms.name: Regulations on Security Protection of Critical Information Infrastructure
norms.description: Enhanced cybersecurity requirements for critical sectors (telecom, energy, finance, etc.). Network security products certification. Data localization.

norms.name: Information Security Technology - Baseline for Classified Protection of Cybersecurity
norms.description: Technical requirements for MLPS 2.0 compliance. Security controls by protection level. Used for MLPS assessment.

norms.name: Information Security Technology - Personal Information Security Specification
norms.description: Best practices for personal information protection. Consent, minimization, transparency, security measures. Referenced for PIPL compliance.

norms.name: China Cybersecurity Review Technology Certification Center
norms.description: Voluntary cybersecurity certification. Becoming required for critical sectors. Certifies security products (firewall, VPN, etc.) and cloud services.

norms.name: National General Safety Technical Code for Textile Products
norms.description: Safety requirements for textiles. pH limits, formaldehyde limits, colorfastness, banned azo dyes. Categories: A (infant), B (direct skin contact), C (non-direct contact).

norms.name: Safety Technical Requirements for Toys
norms.description: Comprehensive toy safety standard. Mechanical/physical properties, flammability, chemical hazards, electrical safety. Required for toy products. CCC certification for some toy categories.

norms.name: Children's Footwear Safety Technical Requirements
norms.description: Safety requirements for children's shoes. Physical, mechanical, chemical requirements. Heavy metal limits, phthalate restrictions.

norms.name: Luminaires - General Requirements and Tests
norms.description: General safety requirements for luminaires. Based on IEC 60598-1. Used with specific standards for different luminaire types.

norms.name: Safety Requirements for Ordinary Lighting LED Modules
norms.description: Safety requirements specific to LED modules. Thermal, electrical, photobiological safety. Required for LED products.

norms.name: Food Safety Law - Food Contact Materials
norms.applies_to: Materials and articles in contact with food
norms.description: Safety requirements for food contact materials. GB standards for different materials (plastics, metals, ceramics, etc.). Migration testing. Pre-market approval for some substances.

norms.name: Food Contact Materials - National Food Safety Standards
norms.description: Series of standards for food contact materials. General requirements (GB 4806.1) plus specific standards for plastics, metals, paper, etc. Migration limits, compositional requirements.

norms.name: Indoor Decorating and Refurbishing Materials - Limit of Formaldehyde Emission of Wood-Based Panels and Finishing Products
norms.description: Formaldehyde emission limits for wood products. E1 class required (≤0.124 mg/m³). Important for furniture, flooring, cabinetry.

norms.name: Ecological Textile Assessment - Technical Requirements
norms.description: Eco-label requirements for textiles. Limits for harmful substances, environmental performance. Voluntary certification.

norms.name: Technical Requirements for Protective Face Masks for Medical Use
norms.description: Technical requirements for medical protective masks. Filtration efficiency, breathing resistance, blood penetration resistance. Required for medical mask registration.

norms.name: Respiratory Protective Equipment - Non-Powered Air-Purifying Particle Respirator
norms.description: Requirements for respiratory protection. Filtration classes: KN (non-oil) and KP (oil-resistant) with 90, 95, 100 levels. Important for industrial PPE.

norms.name: Product Quality Law of the People's Republic of China
norms.description: Framework law for product quality. Manufacturer responsibilities, quality requirements, liability. Basis for product recalls and penalties.

norms.name: Standardization Law of the People's Republic of China
norms.description: Framework for Chinese standards system. GB (mandatory national), GB/T (recommended national), industry standards, enterprise standards. Defines legal status.

norms.name: Environmental Protection Law of the People's Republic of China
norms.description: Comprehensive environmental protection law. Pollution control, environmental impact assessment, liability. Affects manufacturing operations and product environmental performance.

norms.name: Advertising Law of the People's Republic of China
norms.description: Regulations for advertising and product claims. Prohibition of false/misleading claims. Specific requirements for certain products (food, medical, children's products). High penalties.

norms.name: Trademark Law of the People's Republic of China
norms.description: Trademark protection and registration. Affects product branding, labeling. Well-known trademark protection. Administered by CNIPA (China National Intellectual Property Administration).
